ygData.subject: OT neverwinternights Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 543
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, so it s through the caves? I made some notes of some errors in the game-- such as the price you can get your hirelings for. With good persuasion you can
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, so it's through the caves?
I made some notes of some errors in the game-- such as the price you can get
your hirelings for. With good persuasion you can get them for 100gp.
Hey, have you tried going into the Moonstone Mask and hiring a hooker? That
is pretty funny. There was only one male hooker though.
So what happens to Fenthick?
I think it'd be cooler if they had a broader range of npcs you could date or
such. I may make a male character just to see how the Aribeth angle turns
out. heh. Thanks for the info!
luv,
-Su

> I went in through the caves... & then went outside to the courtyard, &
there was Fenthick... I noticed that the book was mistaken on a few
things... probably due in part to bad planning & such, but overall, I
think the book was a great help. I noticed the way the mods work, there's
an end mod to chapter 1 as there is one to chapter 2 also... It seems like
chapter 4 is just the end mod to chapter 3.. Although I'm not sure because I
haven't got through the whole thing yet. In chapter 2, if you are a male
character, you can start up a romance with Aribeth, or if you are female,
you can start one up with Arrin Gend (Lord Nasher's head spy). It is pretty
interesting, & adds an element of well, it just adds an extra element to
the game.
> Kat
> Su <suceress@...> wrote: I'm still in the first or second one--
the one where you go to Castle Helm.
> The book I got said you're supposed to find Fenthick in an alcove in the
> east-- but I haven't found him. Have you?
> I wasn't clear if he was outside or inside bc the guidebook was kinda
> crappy.
> luv,
> -Su
>
> >
> > Neverwinter Nights is a cool game. In the single player I've gotten to
> the final chapter, but Haven't gotten all the way through it yet. I
> haven't Played Warcraft 3 yet, but My Boyfriend just got it today & he's
> playing it as I type this.. Looks interesting... Unfortunately I do not
> have enough room on my hard drive for it =(
> > Kat
> > Su <suceress@...> wrote: I've never played Warcraft but I do
> play Neverwinter Nights. Man, that's a
> > fun game. :-)
> > My mom, myself, my brother, and my sister all have seperate accounts.
:-)
> > luv,
> > -Su
> >
> > LOL....well we started 3 years ago. I play,my wife plays and our kids
have
> > an account too. We have lots of fun at at. Of course now we are
splitting
> > time with Neverwinter Nights and Warcraft 3. But always go back to
EQ...:>
> >
> >
